website_summaries.verdict: No tools needed to set up this versatile, 2-piece metal bed frame.
pros: Great for townhouses and condos, where space is limited, yet quality is desired
Supports over 1,000 pounds and provides 14" of under bed storage space
We love that it doesn't require a box spring
cons: May be uncomfortable for those with thin mattresses

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to unpack and simple to put together. The 14" height provides room for hideaway storage and rambunctious pets. It, being a firm foundation also eliminates the need for a box spring. The only drawback was the way I stubbed my toes on the legs. I purchased black insulation pipe wraps(they resemble noodles). I cut them to fit each leg and no more swearing!
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: I've been framed! 😂
customer_reviews.text: I love this sturdy and simple bedframe! I purchased the mattress, bedding, rug, and lamps in the picture all from Amazon and I couldn't be happier with all of it. The frame is really cool because it collapses down. In a matter of minutes, the frame is only 2 inches thick and can be carried out easily by one person. That would be great for home staging but I use it all the time. Totally worth the price and, if you shop strategically on Amazon, you can get a really high-end look for pennies on the dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: We just got this in today. I am currently 7 months pregnant and had no issues moving, unloading and putting this together. It was super easy, light, no tools required and took less than 5 mins with me taking pics (I'm visual I like pics).
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: Excited to disappointed. Updated: 3/7/2016
customer_reviews.text: Was really happy with how easy it was to assemble and how lightweight it is. However, less than 4 months in, one of the support beams has snapped off where it was connected to the frame. Nothing done except the usual getting in and out of bed. Only a memory foam mattress on top. Updated 3/7/2016 Zinus customer service was very prompt and helpful with filing for my replacement. I received the replacement frame in a week after submitting all the documentation. Greatly appreciate the quick response!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Linh Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Squeakiest Bed Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed for 2 years now and although the height is fantastic for storing all of our luggage, it is the squeakiest bed frame I've even had! I am about 100lbs and my husband is 200lbs. Everytime one of us moves or turns or practically breaths this thing squeaks. Forget about trying to be romantic!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible bed frame
customer_reviews.text: My man and I bought this frame on March 10th. It is now June 4th, and the frame is on its way out. One of the support bars completely broke off today and the frame is bending and unstable. I specifically picked this frame due to its positive reviews and claims of stability and being "heavy duty" just to be on the safe side even though we are both of average weight. Completely disappointed. What a waste of $100.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky or not Squeaky.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my mattress frame and the initial setup was very easy. After attaching all the components the beds doesn’t make a sound. I was skepticial at first because I wasn’t sure if it would squeak, live on an apartment. Once I put the mattress on and moved around on it, no squeaking at all. I recommend it to all those looking for a quiet bed. I will provide an update review if the bed fails and does squeak later on but if you don’t see an update review then know this bed is legit.
customer_reviews.author: julissa alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: no noise, easy to handle, firm enough, perfect storage space under the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Bohua Tian

customer_reviews.title: This IS NOISY.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. This is NOT QUIET and I am very disappointed in the product. A couple weeks ago we bought a different model that had a lot more assembly involved for a Queen bed and it is perfect. Thought this would be the same due to same company. Not the case. Having no noise is why I bought it. So, ending up with a noisy bed is irritating. The mattress we have is a week old and it is made of foam. Definitely the bed frame that is noisy. Will be returning and ordering different model.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne French

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made frame
customer_reviews.text: Who is rating this product!? The only positive things I can say are that it was easy to assemble and it was cheap. But there’s a reason the price is so low. It’s a cheaply made product. Three of the cheap, plastic leg covers that prevent the legs from damaging floors were already cracked when the frame arrived. The welding on the frame is poorly done, so there are rough metal spots that can easily damage the mattress, pad, sheets. My mattress also slides around on the frame, so I already have a bruised shin...and haven’t even slept on it! I’ll buy a carpet pad to cover the entire surface to minimize slippage and reduce possible damage to the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor B

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not good, may last one year.
customer_reviews.text: The bed frame was great the first year, it's been about 14 months and now the bed frame squeaks like crazy. Do yourself a favor and safe up more for something that will last longer. I have an ikea bed frame for our guest room, it was twice the money, but it has been fantastic for the last 5 years. I love the concept of the zinus bed frame but the quality is just not there.
customer_reviews.author: X. LIN

customer_reviews.title: MADE CHEAPLY!
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to take photos of it before I boxed it back up for them to pick up however this came with a defect. One of the prongs that's supposed to be welded on that you screw into another bracket was broken off not to mention parts of the smaller metal piping was bent. After taking a look at it closer I noticed all of the welding was very weak and done poorly. I would not purchase this again. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Bmoney23

customer_reviews.title: Not for children
customer_reviews.text: So the bed is very sturdy. It’s super nice for an adult. It’s not safe however for a toddler or child. I hadn’t even thought about it until today. My son was sliding off the bed how he usually does but today his leg got caught in the gaps. Thank God he didn’t fall over backwards while his leg was stuck because he could’ve been seriously hurt. We could barely move the bar enough to get his leg out. We were about to get bolt cutters to cut his leg free. Idk how it got stuck but it did. I would not recommend this for a toddler or small child without something covering the gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Bed bent and broke under my son after only a year, no response from Zinus customer support for warrantee.
customer_reviews.text: After one year of use this bed collapsed under my son when I sat on it. He did not abuse it. He's big, but he's not overweight. I called Zinus customer support and they told me to send an email to their customer support line with proof of payment and pictures of the bed to claim the warranty. I did just that several times with zero response from them. All of the support members are bent out of shape to some degree as you can see in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Jones

customer_reviews.title: Late Night Surprise
customer_reviews.text: If you had asked me my opinion of this bed frame last week, I would have said it was great, given it 5 stars, and sent you a link to it. However, last night at 3:30 am I was rudely awakened when the legs under my head collapsed and I was suddenly tilting feet up to the ceiling. I have no idea why this happened as it's been in use for almost a month now and nothing has changed to make it move or shift. Be careful if you by this- you may end up with you head sliding towards the floor in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Good but a couple big flaws
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I have two issues with it: 1. The legs are all on the very perimeter / outside edges of the frame and if you use a bed skirt like most people... it hides the legs which are RIGHT THERE waiting for you to kick it and stub your toes. I had done this many a times already. Bad drain in my opinion. 2. My bed skirt and therefore my mattress on top of it just slides around on this frame. Nothing to hold the thing in place. The top of the frame is super slippery so the mattress constantly slides a few inches all the time. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: T. Graham

customer_reviews.title: sturdier than expected! NOISE FREE!
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be fairly sturdy but i was not prepared for just HOW sturdy... i'm 230lbs, my partner is 280lbs, and another partner we have is 218lbs, and we all can sit or lay on our matress with NO noise, NO sway or flex, NOTHING at all! This is more sturdy than our last high quality wooden bed frame! and FAR quieter! Assembly was easy as hell, and TOOL FREE! I have a bad back and arthritis and it took me all of 10 minutes to assemble everything as it uses all wing nuts and caged bolts. Just tightened them up firmly with finger pressure, not even a pair of pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Olivia

customer_reviews.title: 1 month in and still in love
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this with a bit of skepticism. I wasn’t expecting a very sturdy bedframe for the low cost BUT I am pleased to say this was a wise purchase! It does not squeak or make noise even if *ahem* a little woohooing is going on. There’s enough room under to fit the typical under the bed storage containers and putting it together was SO easy! I got the queen and it came as 2 twins to be set together. They unfold and fold back up for storage or easy moving which is great and even with my BeautyRest Euro Plush mattress, I have had zero troubles with the sturdiness of this frame. If you’re undecided — do eht!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tebra Savage

customer_reviews.title: Mattress will slip and slide everywhere
customer_reviews.text: As nice as this frame is, be careful, your mattress will slip right off. If you are walking by and gently bump the mattress, it slides everywhere. I mentioned this to someone who also bought a zinus frame and mattress and they said why didn't I use the non-slip insert that came with the product(s). I never received a non-slip insert. I called Zinus and they stated they don't have an insert and to purchase one on my own. I was little disappointed with their response. So now I guess I'll purchase the non-slip thingy you can put under a rug to keep it from slipping. Other than this issue, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Wesamesa

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: If you only sleep in your bed, you will most likely be satisfied. I bought the extra heavy duty model, I am 175 lbs and my wife is 115 lbs. If you use your bed for anything other than sleeping you may be disappointed. If you have children they will want to know about the sound as the bed rocks, hell your neighbors will know. This is a very noisy bed, comfortable, and noisy. Jmho
customer_reviews.author: Bluto

customer_reviews.title: It's ugly but it works.
customer_reviews.text: Every December and September, the crumbling remnants of cheap Ikea bedframes litter curbs all over Boston. Bedframes are, as a rule, very difficult to assemble once, and particle-board furniture, once disassembled or heavily used, does not hold together very well. Enter this bedframe: it's ugly enough to belong in a hospital, but it works well enough, and if you move, you won't have to buy another bed. As a bonus, there's room underneath for storage, which should allow for enough de-cluttering of your space to compensate for your ugly bedframe.
customer_reviews.author: mince

customer_reviews.title: Weight Limit Not True....
customer_reviews.text: I am a larger woman weighing in at about 280 lbs, and my boyfriend is big as well, around 360 lbs, and i bought this frame under the impression that it had a very large weight limit, up to 2,400 lbs, and it broke at one of the weld points after about 4 months of use, while we were just laying on the bed, not moving at all. Other than the weight limit being incorrect, it was a very sturdy, comfortable frame, until it broke.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but ill-advised design that sacrifices comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. Seriously. It's TWO separate bases that join in the middle, and the middle is solid metal that you feel straight through the mattress, especially if you have a Linenspa 5 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress mattress like ours. If you avoid the middle, you're probably fine. But if you sleep in the middle of the bed...well, you've been warned. You don't feel it at first, but the longer you lay there, but more you realize there's a solid piece of metal messing with your spine.
customer_reviews.author: doctor domuch

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty great. We have our 14" memory foam mattress ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty great. We have our 14" memory foam mattress on it and it eliminated the need to buy a box spring. It doesn't move or squeak at all (we have it sitting on carpet) and it has enough height to storage our suitcases and extra storage bins under it. I'd recommend for sure. We bought a bedskirt to cover the frame and hidden storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: SO noisy!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these, one for each of our teenage boys. We've had them less than a year and pretty much since we got them, they are both VERY noisy. We can hear the boys roll over in bed, sit down, get up. Any movement at all in the bed causes squeaks. We are replacing both of them with (hopefully) quiet bed frames. I can't wait to get rid of them. On the positive side, they were affordable, easy to assemble and they have held up well. But that is all for naught when you consider how noisy they are. Both full size.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy E

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this frame for my son, then I got another for my step daughter, and now we have one in our own room. Yep, 3 of these frames and they are all being used and we love them all. The height is perfect without a box spring. I set this up myself in about 10 minutes and now I have under the bed storage that I didn’t have with my platform bed before. I will never buy another expensive cutesy bed that falls apart within years.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Molina

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my regular queen size mattress!
customer_reviews.text: So one day I figured out my kitties have been using my box spring as a hide-n-seek place. It had several big holes. That's when I decided to look for a platform base for my mattress. The system is two twins size bases that connect with boots and wingnuts included. I did not need any tools; only the wingnuts to tighten fit-in-slot small metal poles. It is a perfect fit and has freed up underbed storage (or kitty play) space. I included photos of cats inside old box spring, new base with mattress and then my 4 naughty kitties. :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: The CREME de la CREME! of Mattress support-SYSTEMS.
customer_reviews.text: I just about DIED, after putting a mattress onto this bed frame. But NOT FROM DANGER!!! OR DIS-COMFORT!!!! No-no, I'd HATE for you to think that. I just about Died because I couldn't BELIEVE it could be that easy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! IN FACT, this is the PREMIERE, okay, the PREMIERE bedframe SYSTEM in North America. ANd that's a FACT! Seriously it's a good bed-frame, the only thing that takes a few minutes is screwing in bolts and twist-tightening them. Solid frame, easy to fold up and transport, plenty of room for storáge underneath, and it's inexpensive. I never heard a single squeak from it. Perhaps because I've never had a guest stay over! :D :'D :'l :l
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M.

customer_reviews.title: dangerous design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Two evenings ago broke my small toe on my right foot on the middle post. Had previously stubbed it a few times and usually put shoes there, rather trip over shoes than smash toe. Alas, the other night my luck ran out. Yesterday morning remembered these was a pool noodle in storage. Cut that to fit the middle support and that should take care of the problem. Please do not ignore the necessity to create some type of protective system for the middle support especially if this is for children, older folks or anyone else. My foot wishes my brain would have remembered the pool noodle earlier and prevented the accident.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Barton

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly even with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: This was amazingly easy to put together! I’m 70 years old and weak, arthritic hands.... but Zip zip!!! It slides out of the box with ease, lay it on the floor and pull it apart.... with ease.... pop the legs back, open the wing nuts in the little cardboard attached to the frame (this requires scissors and was the hardest part) and screw on the 4 wing nuts!! Pull onto its side and lift and place down on the legs . I was shocked I could do it all myself without a helper!!! It’s not a heavy robust frame... but believe it’s s great option for a guest room and the TXL mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Marshy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my queen bed frame no extra tools
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, not extra tools needed to put both smart bases inside my queen bed frame. (Headboard and footboard) Raised bed height. Matteress has no more sagging spots. Completey leveled and so comfortable. Photos below had the 2 sets together and one photo with the first piece I installed. Cat thought he would miss box spring but now bed is up to window height so he loves it just chillin looking out.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Sticky situation
customer_reviews.text: While the frame was super simple to put up, the instructions were incomplete for first time users of non-skid tape. I actually YouTubed “How do you use non skid tape on platform beds”. Sounds simple, however after putting the tape on the bed at the very top and bottom of the bed frame I soon realized that dressing the bed would be difficult and my desire for hospital corners might make the non skid useless. I might have to purchase more and place it closer to the center of the bed. The bed frame is very sturdy, it held my 200lb + frame without squeaking and creeking like an old house. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: I. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try zinus & purchased this frame, zinus memory foam mattress, and Zinus gel foam topper, all queen. This frame is not level, offers no support, you can feel the metal through the mattress, cheap thin metal Bends easily& new zinus mattress syncing with a high point in the middle where base screws together. In retrospect, I would have just spent the extra money to purchase a better quality mattress and in a smaller size. This is definitely not a brand that you can trust for long time use. I’m just really upset that I was uncomfortable after sleeping on it for a week. FYI I am only 140 pounds, no reason for this
customer_reviews.author: Maria0mSw

customer_reviews.title: Great buy because box springs suck.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve included photos of the instructions, what the bed frame looks like right out of the box, and how it sits when it’s set up. Update: we’ve had this for a few months now and I’ll be honest - I hate it. I originally gave it a good review but at this point it’s incredibly loud with every single movement you make on it and doesn’t feel solid under our mattress with all the creaking. We’re replacing it already.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy For Folks With Minimal Space! :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foundation for my new full mattress I purchased last month. I absolutely love this frame. I have a small bedroom so a big bulky frame was a no go. I have to say it definitely supports my mattress really well and if you need room to store some smaller sized storage containers under it there is plenty of space to do so.
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tween Room Makeover!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to do a surprise makeover on my 12-year-old son's room while he was out. This went together in minutes, and I was glad I could do it on my own (petite 50+ year old mom). He was rolling around on it within minutes of seeing his "new" room. The frame didn't budge or make any noise. I put 12" cloth baskets underneath the bed. They barely fit, and I could only put 4 under from one side, but it worked out great for us.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Headboard is mission impossible
customer_reviews.text: I suppose a headboard could be applied if you had a drill, knowledge of metallurgy and bracketing, a willingness to permanently modify the product to fit a headboard, and patience. We had none of those and could not. We have been living without headboards on our four beds. Consequently, our pillows fall off and our walls are being discolored. We will not be using this product again. Too bad for us because we otherwise like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kent L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with lots of room underneath
customer_reviews.text: Pre-assembly size is reasonably small. Super-easy setup. Bought for easy packing so the kids can easily take it with them when then leave home! It's an excellent platform: sturdy and lots of storage room. If you don't use the included tape, the mattress will slide around a bit. Paired this with a Zinus foam mattress and had the easiest home delivery of a bed EVER. I'm definitely a fan of Zinus because I keep replacing all my beds (and kid's beds) with their stuff!
customer_reviews.author: The Road Runner

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for bigger people.
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year of use, the side where my husband sleeps has has a metal support bar bend almost to the ground. Now there's a big dip where he sleeps due to the bent frame.
customer_reviews.author: Regan Sobaje

customer_reviews.title: Looks sturdy, easy to assemble, sizing isn’t ideal
customer_reviews.text: My husband set this up last night and it seems sturdy. Set up did not seem difficult. I will say the slats look pretty far apart so that is an issue. I believe the recommendation is no more than 4 inches and this looks like more. I will try to measure tonight. Also, the metal frame is bigger than the mattress to the point where I’m worried about my kids or us getting hurt on it. It sticks out too much. I needed something fast though and this did the trick with prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NOT noise-free, just low-quality.
customer_reviews.text: This thing creaks and squeaks with every single move I make- so obnoxious. My last frame, another low-budget frame like this from another brand, never made this much noise, so Zinus is just putting out false claims with this being “noise-free.” I’ve tried tightening everything without over doing it but it’s still very noisy. I’m not a heavy dude either- 180lbs. It was never noise-free from the start but it’s just getting worse and I’ve literally only had it 1.5 months, aka outside of the return window so now I’m S.O.L. I’ve heard nothing but bad things about Zinus products so I can’t be surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is solid, but many wingnuts were stripped
customer_reviews.text: The frame itself is solid and doesn't squeak, but at least 50% of the wingnuts did not thread smoothly onto the bolts and I really had to force them to turn, likely stripping the bolts. Not very impressed with the quality of bolts and nuts, but the frame itself feels very sturdy with no squeaks. The problem is some of the bolts are welded onto the support arms, so it's not like I can replace them if they strip.
customer_reviews.author: OfficeSpace

customer_reviews.title: Holds up over time
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed frame for about 3 years now. I bought it knowing I needed something that could break down and move with me as I transitioned between schools and jobs. It folds down very nicely to fit into a normal sized van and sets up in about 5 minutes. It gives me plenty of room underneath to store the flat Rubbermaids and all the other junk I want to keep out of sight. Even after all this time it still looks exactly the same as when I bought it. Even though I picked this as my inexpensive option, I think this'll last with me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: avid_student

customer_reviews.title: Double check your mattress height XD
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously easy to assemble. I think that the two halves of the frame—which stand independently— would work as army cots as well. They fold up for storage. Not as much room underneath as I thought there would be, but still satisfactory. Bed isn’t ‘hard’ and I can’t feel any of the frame through my 13” (not 9”) memory foam mattress. Very sturdy. Downside: underestimated mattress height makes the bed a wee tall for me; I can’t touch the floor. Also: Other reviews say the mattress slides—mine came with nonslip grip tape you put on the frame. It’s not budging. Now I have to return the mattress grip pad I ordered with it! Worth the money. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. It comes essentially already assembled, you just need to flip the legs out and put in 4 winged screws (I don't know the real term for them). Since it's foldable it'll be very convenient when I have to move out of here. I'm used to having bed frames that have a million parts that take forever to put together, so this is really a dream. But warning note: be careful as you're flipping it over as I did scratch my floors. The edges of the center area have screws that scratch the floor so I suggest putting the card board box underneath the center of the frame as you're flipping it around.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this Frame !  Glad to get RID of my funky old frane!
customer_reviews.text: Love this frame! It eliminates having to purchase box springs for my California King mattress and supports the mattress much better than my old box springs and horrible old frame. In order for the feet of the frame to not ruin our carpet, I purchased carpet protectors with spikes and also added a strip of anti-slip tape inside the protectors to eliminate the legs from sliding. To top off the purchase, I ordered the Zinus Sleep Master Headboard Brackets for my wrought iron headboard. Additionally, I added some “plumbers tape” to secure the headboard legs to the brackets as only one of the holes lined up to secure with a screw. Very happy with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Santa Cruz Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Great support and really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We needed something new to get our son's mattress off the floor further (moving into a new town home and we were reconfiguring everyone's rooms). This unit is lightweight yet strong and powerful. It places the box spring off the ground well and provides ample area underneath for additional storage (who knew I would want that space for extra stuff?). As it turns out, our dog likes it as well as he likes to sleep with our son and he crawls under the bed each night to be near him. This does everything we need it to do at an affordable price. It was really easy to set up and we look forward to using it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris HamiltonTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: The best frame you will ever want to have.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.....my ashley 14" beauty sleep fits perfectly on top...( I used the box from the matress to put between the frame and the matress for more protection to the matress) easiest frame ever to assemble....it took just 5 minutes.....really....that simple....and the plastic containers we purchased fit perfectly underneath with half a cm to spare. Zinus Inc has got their act together, with quality and simplicity to assemble. PERFECT. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Miguel Berard

customer_reviews.title: Does the job... but isn't great
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It's overall a good deal. Cons: The arms that hook into the frame to lock it into place seem to come out daily. I would recommend screwing a bolt to secure them into place. My mattress slides off the bedframe and I can't seem to figure out why. It was worse when I had a bed skirt underneath. Pros: It is tall, but not too tall. Great for storage. Easy to set up. Didn't need any help carrying it or getting it into my apartment. It is cheap and does the job. Hasn't broke or bent on me. Overall a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Clark

customer_reviews.title: Strong, so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: It measures exactly to its product dimensions. I was worried if it would fit into my bed frame, but it JUST did by about a half inch. Deffinetly strong. I will update if there are any futures problems.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Devils

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing build quality, not great for foam mattresses
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this frame, purchased something similar and it was solid. Upgraded to a Leesa King bed and figure this would do the job: within a few months the little support beams detached and started to carve up the underside of my mattress voiding the warranty, along with causing major sagging in those spots. Even more annoying is there's now a very noticeable squeak and cream from the frame, even after tightening everything up. This is all after three years of use, definitely looking for a replacement now. If you're getting one of those premium mattresses, do yourself a favor and get something better that won't void your warranties.
customer_reviews.author: Der Tintenfisch

customer_reviews.title: A Breeze to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This took MAYBE 15 minutes to assemble, if that. It is so incredibly sturdy, I was actually surprised at how well it holds up. No shaking. I am so happy with the way it looks with my headboard and footboard (I placed the headboard and footboard on with the Zinus Headboard/footboard brackets.). I would highly recommend this bed frame. It is a true full size bed frame with great sturdiness and under bed storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tenacious

customer_reviews.title: A great value for a sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these in the past few years, 2 for our mom's house and two for ours. Fantastic base. It is super sturdy, but not too heavy. There is plenty of room for storage bins under it. I notice that there are also predrilled holes to attach headboards and foot boards, but I haven't done this yet. The one thing I would say as a con, is you have to place something like rubber or a slip proof fiber between the mattress and frame, otherwise the mattress may move a bit. The frame doesn't have any stoppers for the mattress to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Rubens Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Not the Amazon basics platform bed, but close
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the Amazon basics platform bed (which was out of stock at the time) so I purchased this one instead. It is sturdy and easy to put up, much like the Amazon basics bed, but even with the provided tape, the mattress slides and shifts, though not by much. If you don’t want to worry about that, I’d get the Amazon basics bed. Other than that, this bed is almost the equivalent. It even has holes where I was able to attach it to a headboard that I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: It was as easy to assemble as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I bought this bed frame to replace an old wooden futon frame. We were a little cautious about it, especially since we were using a not very thick innerspring futon mattress. We've used it for a couple of weeks now, and we are extremely pleased. It was indeed very easy to assemble -- it took me maybe a half hour, and that's because I was being very cautious. We have also found it quite comfortable to sleep on, and quite sturdy (our bedroom has a carpet, so I can't speak for those who have found that it squeaks on a bare floor). In short, so far we're very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BarbK

customer_reviews.title: Easiest set up ever
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son's 8th birthday, he was getting to big for the convertible crib/bed I purchased when he was 10 months. I did my research as I always do before purchasing items for my son, especially something I expect to have for many years. I was impressed with the reviews on Amazon so I bought it. It came on time and only took 10 minutes to set up, literally. Once I put on his new mattress, it was big enough for us both to lay on. I was really happy with the sturdiness & quality. My son has been sleeping great ever since and loves having a big boy bed at last!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Lettré Keyser

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is perfect but...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is perfect but I had to give it 5 stars! It was easy to assemble...virtually intuitive actually. I tightened everything by hand. It left more room underneath than the box spring I replaced. It works great with the memory foam mattress I bought from Amazon a couple years ago. I've experienced no noise and could tell an immediate difference in sturdiness compared to my box spring. I've recommended it to others and while nothing's perfect, I can't find anything wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sturdy frame with storage and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bed frame. Comes shipped in a convenient box in order to put things in place, super easy to put together. Very sturdy, and plenty of support for my 10" memory foam mattress. Its got great storage underneath, I use some sterilite containers for clothes, boardgames, and shoes, as well some space bags for winter linens (living in florida, very rarely used). Its also super easy to clean underneath, as a Roomba fits comfortably under it, and my upright vacuum can in about 10 inches on a side. I bought my original one 6 years ago, and we're getting a new one for our spare room this fall.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly well engineered, rock solid, no tool assembly,  a great value in bed platforms!
customer_reviews.text: I had to set up a new bed in a hurry, so I took a chance and ordered this on Amazon. Reading through the reviews, I bought a dozen 1/4" lock washers which I used when putting this together - I think I used 10 of them. No tools! It goes together quickly and is rock solid without squeaks for creaks. I'm using it to support a 10" memory foam mattress, but it would work for any mattress. The metal legs have good toe-stubbing potential, so I took some pipe insulation (from the big box hardware store) and gave the legs bumpers. I can't say enough good things about this buy!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and sturdy enough for 400lbs of adults/dogs
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was simple. Didn't look impressively sturdy, but holds my 12" worth of mattress and topper, a dozen pillows and a half dozen blankets (I have a problem) just fine. Two adults (at 120 and 180lbs) and two dogs (40 and 60) have gotten pretty rough at various times on this bed. No issues whatsoever with the supports The storage space under the bed is amazing. The previously mentioned dogs occasionally sleep under it. Those cheap round laundry baskets fit perfectly, as do shorter storage totes. The angled support bars at the corners may limit some of your storage options there, as it drops the clearance to around 8" for pulling items back out around the corners Overall incredibly pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy, no noise, no movement
customer_reviews.text: We were concerned about putting a memory foam mattress on this frame, but the other reviews helped us decide. Glad we chose this one! It was easy to assemble, surprisingly sturdy and well made, there's no noise when we move around on the bed, and there's no swaying or movement of the frame either. I thought perhaps the 14" height would make it less stable, but so far, so GREAT! We are very pleased with this bedframe, and that's saying something because we've gone through a lot of them in them past 20 years, looking for one that is sturdy and NOT noisy. Found it in this Zinus Gene 14" SmartBase Deluxe Bedframe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nance

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy to assemble it is
customer_reviews.text: I had the queen size frame (14in) for 2years but recentlt had to downsize my bed to a full size due to my new room being smaller. I immediately bought this one but 18in for extra storage space and it did not disappoint!!! It came pretty much pre-assembled, I only had to screw 4 nuts on each platform and screw them in together, flip, done. It makes me happy knowing that it will be just as easy to disassemble for my next move. Also, the queen size I had never squeaked, ever. I'm hoping the full size one is just as wonderful! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great and Cheap
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these bed frames for our Sons' bedroom. They Are really easy to assemble. And by "assemble" you literally just have to unfold them. They also don't require box springs which is a must for us. They are sturdy and tall enough to have storage underneath or if your kid wants to lay underneath and build a little fortress they can. They all love their new beds.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: The " Smart Base" is NOT SO SMART
customer_reviews.text: The " Smart Base" is NOT SO SMART. The "Zinus" mattress slides all over the base so you'll need the "Zinus not-slip pads". The Smart Base (size full) is too small for the headboard (also size full). The headboard was supposed to fit The "Zinus Smart Base" but it does not fit. The headboard sticks out about 3 inches on each side! It looks awful. The "Zinus" bed skirt does not fit well either. It slips out from under the mattress and since it ties like an apron at the back of the mattress...if you have a headboard the skirt is absolutely useless!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Agno

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for over a year and am extremely pleased with this purpose. My husband and I are both over 200#, and this has exceeded all expectations. We have since bought a twin size as well as a full size for our other 2 bedrooms. Our guests loved the beds and the fact that they can store their suitcases under the bed leaving more floor space. Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Whitley 5903

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality bedframe, priced perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got this bedframe after I wanted to upgrade my bedroom experience. I got rid of my old mattress, old box springs, and old frame, and upgraded! I wanted to ensure I had a nice frame to put my new memory foam bed on, and found this one to be exactly what I was looking for. I love the simple yet sturdy appearance of it, it's the perfect height, and is absolutely quiet. It makes no noise whatsoever. I'm very happy with my purchase, and Zinus will be a brand I keep in mind for the future because I'm impressed with the quality. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I searched for weeks for a bed for my daughter that was bigger than a toddler bed but smaller than a twin. I ordered from Walmart and the frame AND mattress was too big. I came across the TWIN NARROW & I can’t tell you how happy I was. It’s been a life saver. Super easy to put together. 4 screws tightened and that’s it. The first fram was a little damaged but they were super nice about quickly sending me a replacement. It fit perfect and she really loves it. If you want an upgrade for smaller spaces this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would’ve bought this sooner! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated for quite some time to buy this and regret it, wish I would have bought sooner!! I was really concerned about squeaking and noise but it is absolutely quiet, our wood box spring were noisier! Assembly was a piece of cake, took Longer to disassemble & vacuum than it did to assemble the new bed frame. Super impressed with the quality and it seems to have improved our mattress because it’s much more stable! *disclaimer* we’ve only slept on it one night . Will update if my opinion changes. ****UPDATE***It’s been a couple weeks now and I regret not buying it sooner! No squeaks, excellent support!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about this frame being sturdy and non-squeaky but wow, I'm really impressed! Super easy to set up (queen size is two small frames bolted together), not a single squeak even with two adults and two kids rolling around on it! We paired it with theIt does slide on our hardwood floor so we purchased non-skid pads to go under the feet. You will need brackets to attach a headboard! We did not realize this until we went to hook it up. We purchased these bracketsto attach this headboard. I love how lightweight and easy to move this frame is. I will definitely purchase this frame again as we replace beds in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It did its job and was sturdy enough for the innerspring mattress with some boxes stored underneath. The one complaint was the slippery surface. The all metal construction was great for support, but it did little for keeping the mattress in place. We laid down some rubber mats under the mattress to create some friction for keeping the mattress from moving every time you bump the edge.
customer_reviews.author: CDub

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very happy with this purchase. Bed is sturdy and comfy, Super easy to put together out of the package. Folds up for storage if necessary. I am a plus sized woman and I feel safe and secure on this frame. The only cons: cant attach headboard without extra hardware. Bed is more challenging to make if against wall as the legs have grippy material. I have bruised my knees/shins on frame countless times while making bed. Much less squeaky than my traditional frame and box spring. Storage underneath is great. I would give frame 9/10!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put this together in under 20 minutes. I could have done it myself, it was that easy. This is in our guest bedroom with a memory foam mattress, no box spring and is still so comfortable- we have had 5 different couples stay in the past few months and they all said they slept great. Its high enough that I can store file boxes under it and easily vaccuum under the bed. We have a similar bed frame in our room and love it, so I knew this would be a great investmet. Our guest room is small, so it was important that we got something that wasnt bulky. I would definitely recommend this bed frame!
customer_reviews.author: Gillian C. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying my son loved his bed so much until it collapsed while he was sleeping. Seriously the leg broke off! I don't know how, it just did. My son is only 70lbs, he doesn't jump on the bed, only sits and sleeps on the bed. He does move around a lot while he sleeps. But I don't believe it should have broke the legs. It was easy to assemble, we thought it was sturdy, until tonight happened. We did disassemble it once. We did not move it around a lot. What I liked about it was it was easy to disassemble and reassemble to clean under the bed. Unfortunately it is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne ⭐️

customer_reviews.title: Never getting a box spring again
customer_reviews.text: I have a luxury queen sized mattress and needed a replacement for my box spring and bedframe. Comfort is extremely important to me on my bed, I have trouble sleeping on crappy mattresses, couches, etc. Used a traditional box spring with this mattress for 6 years. This is just as good in terms of support, I didn't even notice the difference. It's also lighter, and provides enough clearance underneath for storage of large objects like banker boxes and luggage. Also, I CAN ACTUALLY CLEAN UNDER MY BED EASILY! Don't be fooled by the price and cheap looking appearance, this gets the job done just as well as a standard box spring and bed frame. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase and love them
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I bought. I love that I can store things under the bed. They seem as sturdy as a regular frame if not more sturdy. I am not trying to attach a headboard so I don't remember if they have holes. I also left my box springs on top. If you do this, you must go up one size in bedspread to cover enough. Or buy a second bedskirt. I worried my choice of leaving the box springs would be too high for my grands at 5-11 years but they aren't having any trouble. That said the company does say this rail replaces the need for a box springs.
customer_reviews.author: AngieSewTherapy

customer_reviews.title: Get a houseful
customer_reviews.text: Our 14yr old has had this base in a full for over 2 years.....we just got one in queen delivered today, and when our twins outgrow the bunkbeds, they'll be getting this as well. These frames go together in under 10min, one person can do it and you need zero tools. They're incredibly lightweight but sturdy. The one we have had survived many wrestling matching with our boys and it's still as good as new. We stepped up to the deluxe version for our room considering 2 adults will be in it. I'll check back in a few months to confirm that this frame is as quality as our other.
customer_reviews.author: It’s Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great value, reasonable product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my new Zinus mattress (gift). Was very easy to put together, sturdy, albeit a little cheaply manufactured. I’ve put mine on bed risers, which is awkward, as I had to purchase 3 sets of 4 (11 legs) to lift appropriately. There are angled support bars underneath that take away from some of your storage space, otherwise I wouldn’t have needed the risers (I live in an efficiency apartment, so limited storage space). Aside from that awkwardness, the frame has been fine, doesn’t move even though the mattress is maybe 20 pounds. No other complaints - but pay close attention to description, as special brackets are required to attach a headboard. I have no headboard.
customer_reviews.author: arreis325

customer_reviews.title: Great platform bed frame
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using a platform bed frame. I've always had headboards and footboards. I was replacing a twin size mattress with a full size mattress in a guest bedroom for my granddaughter. The description says "easy assembly" and it definitely was. It took me more time to slide the contents out of the box than it took to assemble. No tools really needed. The entire frame was smooth. No sharp edges that might damage a mattress. I like that the legs are recessed (no stubbed toes). I also like the rounded corner edges. I really like having the storage space underneath the frame. I highly recommend this product. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Quality is BAD and customer service is NOT responding
customer_reviews.text: Updated: I reached out to zinis customer service. They responded and asked for my information. I provided everything but no response since then. Very disappointed! Original: At the beginning I thought this was a nice bed with great price. But after 4 months it is broken now. Only normal use...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seemed used
customer_reviews.text: While i do like this product a lot...(I've owned one before) I'm giving less than 5 stars because the "new" one came bent in the center rods and missing the bottom cover to one of the legs. It seems like it might have been used even though I bought it new. It's such a HUGE box and such a hassle to return Amazon things (even though it's supposed to be easy) so I'm just going to keep it...but I am not happy. On a positive note.... It is a good product, it's durable and it doesn't squeak a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Andreina

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything. And I mean Everything!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bedframe almost a month ago and wanted to wait on writing a review until I was confident enough to review it. All I can say is that I am very satisfied by the pricing alone. I bought the bed frame after remodeling my bedroom and it looks modernized after a few adjustments. Besides the aesthetics, I also want to adress how sturdy and quiet the frame is. I tend to move alot in my sleep and I've had lots of sex in it. After all the punishment I've given it, the bedframe is still in tact. Zinus has a potential consumer in me.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: 3 Years Later
customer_reviews.text: Listen - I've had this bed frame for THREE YEARS now, and I have not had a single complaint! I've moved three times since buying this, and this thing has stood up to the challenge of being assembled, disassembled, thrown around a moving truck, etc. The bed frame doesn't creak or feel flimsy at all. It's so sturdy and great quality. I love the height it adds.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Space saving alternative to a bed frame for a foam or hybrid mattress so that I could store things underneath. I especially like that the legs were set back under just a few inches so you don’t catch your feet as you’re walking by. We did forget to remove the wing nuts during the first move and they got bent while trying to disassemble the frame, but it actually worked fine without being connected and was just as stable but did slide a tiny bit apart over time and when I got around to it the new wing nuts fix the problem and the frame is just as good as ever.
customer_reviews.author: J. Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not good for memory foam with two people.
customer_reviews.text: It’s fine for one person if you have a memory foam mattress. Once two people lay in it - it sinks in the middle. It’s horribly uncomfortable for two people where we both end up hugging the edge of the bed to avoid back pain in the morning. We will now have to buy plywood to put under this to shore it up.
customer_reviews.author: harperr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and slim
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the matching Zinus foam mattress, and the two products work well together. We needed an extra bed we could set up quickly when guests show up and this is perfect; it went together in literally 2 minutes, faster than the mattress. Unexpected bonus: the bedframe is high enough that guests can stow their luggage and gear under it, so it saves space too. Usual occupant is a 20-year old 6'1" 200-plus pound man; he says the bed is solid and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leete

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the Zinus 12" Cal King Green Tea Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't make a noise, or shake in any way. It's far more stable than I would have imagined it to be, and since no one else has addressed this issue in their reviews, YES you can "go to town" on this frame/stand with no issues. No wobbling, or movement. Works great with the Zinus 12" Cal King Green Tea Mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Nichol

customer_reviews.title: No squeaks!
customer_reviews.text: Goes together easily, is lightweight, and very sturdy. Great platform for any mattress and high enough it doesn't need a box spring unless you just want to put one on there. I'm a tosser-and-turner, and there is no squeaking to wake me up. Will be buying one for my daughter for her new place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will take a wide load just like mothers
customer_reviews.text: Works like magic. Put both together in 3 minutes flat got rid of box spring. Got my wife jacked in the crack in 10 minutes flat. Not one squeak, sprung spring nor broken board could stop this train. 190 pounds of TnA squirt gun on top of 270 pounds of rock hard beef in tube form. Very well built product so far. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: who's bad

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution to having a mattress without a boxspring. I had a mattress on the floor for when we visited our second home. This stay got extended so I was looking for an inexpensive solution to buying a frame and boxspring. This frame is study, very quiet and allows for storage of suitcases and bins under the bed. I put it together myself very quickly. The only thing you might have to get used to is, the leg at the middle part of the frame is near the edge. It could stub your toe, but you only do it once and remember it's there.
customer_reviews.author: P. McMahel

customer_reviews.title: Price was right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Sleep On Latex queen sized 8" mattress. It gets the job done but A: the aesthetics are not top notch B: I had to place cardboard under the mattress (the wiring on the base was thin and I didn't trust it to not tear into the mattress.) C: It appears to be two twins latched together. A plus is the room under it for storage. But you definitely want your bedspread to cover a generous portion of the bottom and sides. Bottom line, for the price it works great,. I'll prolly build my own platform in time, but this is fine until I do.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I got it to work
customer_reviews.text: I got it to work. Initially, I could not get the frame to stay in place. I looped it into the holes with this hooks, but sometimes I’d be asleep and it would just fall down on one end. It’s disturbing to wake up with your head hanging down underneath your headboard! However, I made a move and just mentioned this to my mover. Somehow he tightened the connecting areas. I think he used duct tape. Now it’s super sturdy. I’m not afraid that it will fall, and I have been sleeping on it for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Came home from grad school to stay with the parents during the COVID-19 pandemic and was tired of sleeping on a mattress on the floor, so I ended up ordering this. It's a simple bed frame and is easy to assemble. It can be folded and is easy to store. Nothing much else to say honestly. Don't waste your time looking at other bed frames on Amazon. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ochemfreak

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to put together. The directions are a little bit weird, but I figured it out. My one real complaint would be that one side is a little bit higher than the other, which makes it a little bit weird when you're rolling around in bed. It's just me in my bed, so often times I end up sideways. Also, I thought the tape that you put down on the frame to keep the mattress in place was pretty weird, but it actually works. My mattress doesn't slip around.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It’s a big NO from me
customer_reviews.text: Really good if you like sleeping on pavement. Literally made my feel like sleeping on my driveway, think I might prefer that. I woke up with the achiest back & hips I have ever had in my life. I have a new innerspring mattress with a pillowtop, which still needs some breaking on but it is WAY harder now than it was before. Storage is good & it is well made, but DEFINITELY still needs a box spring.
customer_reviews.author: mitchelljessica

customer_reviews.title: Helped our mattress
customer_reviews.text: I will preface this by saying that we need a new mattress. It sinks in the middle and draws us into it, making for an uncomfortable sleeping situation. We feel the price of a new box spring is ridiculous so we bought this to see if one is needed. It is not! This foundation improved our mattress significantly. It still needs to be replaced, but because it has more support underneath, it no longer sinks and provides a much better sleep than before. I was concerned about the contradicting weight limits on the page since I'm obese, but it holds everything and everyone just fine. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame for a memory foam mattress. It comes in two parts. One of the parts was warped in the middle, so it was difficult getting them attached together. Because there is no lip to hold the mattress, double sided tape is included to grab the mattress and adjusting the mattress on the frame pulls on that tape. Since one of the parts was warped, the gap in the middle was so wide that the tape barely fit. The legs of the frame do not lock in place, so if you move the frame, the legs buckle in.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this bed I was soooo excited as it’s high and I got it mainly so I could store things underneath. I set it up April 12th and August 1st the bottom part broke like sunk in I almost fell while changing bedsheets 😭 we tried to fix it but the screws it comes with just go through. Won’t be purchasing again or recommending it’s a cheap frame but I expected it to last longer now I have to BUY another frame as this one is falling apart and is becoming a hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: For the price- can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: I had this foundation for 5 years and am just getting rid of it today. It has held up well over time with a foam mattress and two people sleeping on it. HOWEVER, check the welds when you get it- mine has one that completely came apart in the middle of the bed (so I didn't even know until today) and one of the small non-essential metal pieces that makes the "net" of the base that also snapped. For what I paid, I cannot complain. Really held up through 5 moves (literally takes 5 minutes to take apart and fold up- awesome!), lets you store stuff underneath, and is pretty sturdy. Perfect budget purchase
customer_reviews.author: MarvelousMrsBateman

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but not too sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design - very quick and simple assembly. I wanted to order another one for my other daughter's bed, and decided to check fit in the bed frame. Just discovered that several of the mattress supports are bowed after two years with my 125-lb middle school daughter. The worst is bent 7/8" (22mm). I'll be ordering a different one this time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Beats a box spring/frame combo anyday.
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressed as to the quality and the simplicity of assembly. Used this one with a bed that came in a box, an actual 13" mattress that was compressed and rolled up. Amazing what they can do nowadays! The fact it's 14" tall makes it easy for my upright vacuum to get under there. No more dust bunnies!!! Incidentally, there are now 3 of these in the house, having replaced the box springs/foundations AND the bed frame. At a price less than a box spring and better built than most cheap foundations (and usually cheaper than those, too!).
customer_reviews.author: DukeCityMan
